ViewObject.Name: ReportProdVariantLov
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT_DESC AS VARIANT_SEARCH, (FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT || ' ' || FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT_DESC) AS SET_VARIANT_DESC FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_ITEM_MASTER_CATEGORY FcsViewItemMasterCategory WHERE FcsViewItemMasterCategory.TYPE_TABLE = 'MASTER' AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.ITEM_ID IS NULL AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CATEGORY = NVL(:P_SET_CATEGORY, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CATEGORY) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CLASS = NVL(:P_SET_CLASS, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CLASS) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_BRAND = NVL(:P_SET_BRAND, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_BRAND) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_EXT = NVL(:P_SET_EXTENTION, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_EXT) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_PACKAGING = NVL(:P_SET_PACKAGING, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_PACKAGING) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT = NVL(:P_SET_VARIANT, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT) AND NVL(FcsViewItemMasterCategory.ITEM,'KOSONG') = NVL(:P_PRODUK_ITEM, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.ITEM) UNION SELECT FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT_DESC AS VARIANT_SEARCH, (FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT || ' ' || FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT_DESC) AS SET_VARIANT_DESC FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_ITEM_MASTER_CATEGORY FcsViewItemMasterCategory WHERE FcsViewItemMasterCategory.TYPE_TABLE = 'COMBINATION' AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CATEGORY = NVL(:P_SET_CATEGORY, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CATEGORY) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CLASS = NVL(:P_SET_CLASS, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_CLASS) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_BRAND = NVL(:P_SET_BRAND, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_BRAND) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_EXT = NVL(:P_SET_EXTENTION, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_EXT) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_PACKAGING = NVL(:P_SET_PACKAGING, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_PACKAGING) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT = NVL(:P_SET_VARIANT, FcsViewItemMasterCategory.SET_VARIANT) AND FcsViewItemMasterCategory.ITEM = NVL(:P_PRODUK_ITEM,FcsViewItemMasterCategory.ITEM) ORDER BY SET_VARIANT_DESC
